bibl.title: Re-evaluating a "Dowry" in a Michigan "Marriage" Loan.
bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 92 [edd.: T. GAGOS, L. KOENEN and B.E. McNELLEN, A First Century Archive from Oxyrhynchos or Oxyrhynchite Loan Contracts and Egyptian Marriage, Life in a Multi-Cultural Society (Chicago, 1992), Appendix I, p. 200]. In the loan agreement, there are only three objects involved, not four.
